HTML.Project aims: The final goal of the Che4 project is to run Eclipse Flux in Eclipse IDE (without dependencies on RabbitMQ and Node.js). Also the project has educational purposes, it reveals some unobvious capabilities of Eclipe RCP.
HTML.BingSplashDescription: Substitute Eclipse RCP splash sreen with images from Bing.com
HTML.ApacheCamelDescription: Run Apache Camel as HTTP reverse proxy
HTML.EclipseAsServiceDescription: Run Eclipse IDE as Windows or Linux service
